RST cheat sheet¶

Subsection¶

Sub-subsection¶

More info about RST: Link.

NOTE: RST requires to leave a blank line between environments.

To add images, this should be always be placed in _static folder:

Add code directly in the rst file:

System.out.println("...")

To add a code from a source file file:

public class CausalModel {
    public static void main(String[] args) {

        /* This code implements the Party example */

        StructuralCausalModel model = new StructuralCausalModel();

Add inline math latex: \(p(\mathbf{x})\)

Add latex equation:

\[q(z,\theta) \approx p(z,\theta | x_{train})\]
